name: Mr Eighth Scream - Don't stop
description:
Mr Eighth Scream! Don't stop!
This is a sound control game.Once you start,you can't stop.

The most addictive and unique 2D action game in the world.

Endless model
Eighth level mode
Runner level model
Flappy level model

---How to play---
-Speek softly to make the chicken walk
-Scream to make the chicken jump
